AI Description: PlasmidFinder is a tool for in silico detection of plasmids in bacterial genomes. It identifies plasmid replicon sequences by comparing input DNA sequences to a predefined database of known plasmids.
Core Features: In Silico Detection Of Plasmids, Identification Of Plasmid Replicon Sequences, Comparison To A Database Of Known Plasmids
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genomics, Microbiology, Bacterial Genomics, Plasmid Detection
